snippet: The Lahore high court denied the plea by Asia Bibi, who says co-workers wrongly accused her of blasphemy. She may still appeal to the Supreme Court.
abstract: Lahore High Court of Appeals in Pakistan upholds death sentence of Pakistani Christian woman Asia Bibi, who says Muslim co-workers wrongly accused her of blasphemy; she may still appeal to country's Supreme Court.

byline.original: By WAQAR GILLANI and SALMAN MASOOD

lead_paragraph: The Lahore high court denied the plea by Asia Bibi, who says co-workers wrongly accused her of blasphemy. She may still appeal to the Supreme Court.

headline.main: Pakistani Christian Woman’s Appeal of Death Sentence Is Rejected
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: Death Sentence Is Upheld in Blasphemy Case
